author: Amith Mendis
title: Decentralized Content Platform
description:
Content Platforms (Netflix) are making Billions as the profit as the middleman.  
Unfair rewarding for creators  
High fees for end users
solution:
Create a decentralized content platform (Tokenized).

Users - pay only for usage

Creators - rewarding based on the usage

Amith - 11+ years, Shehan - 8+ years, Kawinda - 8+ years, Yeshan - 6+ years of experience in software industry.
